string-array.name: section1
string-array.item: What does God say about all these Commandments?

string-array.name: section3
string-array.item: The First Petition (What does this mean?)
The First Petition (How is God\'s name kept holy?)
The Second Petition (What does this mean?)
The Second Petition (How does God\'s kingdom come?)
The Third Petition (What does this mean?)
The Third Petition (How is God\'s will done?)
The Fourth Petition (What does this mean?)
The Fourth Petition (What is meant by daily bread?)

string-array.name: section4
string-array.item: Which is that word of God?
What does Baptism give or profit?
Which are such words and promises of God?
How can water do such great things?
What does such baptizing with water signify?

string-array.name: section5
string-array.item: What are the words about the ministry of the keys?
Ministry of the keys (What does this mean?)
How the simple should be taught to confess

string-array.name: section6
string-array.item: What is the Sacrament of the Altar?
What is the benefit of such eating and drinking?
How can bodily eating and drinking do such great things?
Who, then, receives such Sacrament worthily?
